verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> year שָׁל֗וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> In the third לְכ֙וֹרֶשׁ֙ <S%H3566><s%> of Cyrus מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king פָּרַ֔ס <S%H6539><s%> of Persia דָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> a thing נִגְלָ֣ה <S%H1540><s%> was revealed לְדָֽנִיֵּ֔אל <S%H1840><s%> unto Daniel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who נִקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> was called שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> whose name בֵּלְטְשַׁאצַּ֑ר <S%H1095><s%> Belteshazzar וֶאֱמֶ֤ת <S%H571><s%> [was] true הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> and the thing וְצָבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> but the time appointed גָד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [was] long וּבִין֙ <S%H995><s%> and he understood אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> the thing וּבִ֥ינָה <S%H998><s%> and had understanding ל֖וֹ בַּמַּרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H4758><s%> of the vision

בַּיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> In those days הָהֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> those אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I דָֽנִיֵּאל֙ <S%H1840><s%> I Daniel הָיִ֣יתִי <S%H1961><s%> had been מִתְאַבֵּ֔ל <S%H56><s%> was mourning שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> three שָׁבֻעִ֖ים <S%H7620><s%> weeks יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> full

לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread חֲמֻד֞וֹת <S%H2530><s%> beauty לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor אָכַ֗לְתִּי <S%H398><s%> I ate וּבָשָׂ֥ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh וָיַ֛יִן <S%H3196><s%> nor wine לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor בָ֥א <S%H935><s%> neither came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about פִּ֖י <S%H6310><s%> in my mouth וְס֣וֹךְ <S%H5480><s%> neither did I anoint לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor סָ֑כְתִּי <S%H5480><s%> myself at all עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until מְלֹ֕את <S%H4390><s%> were fulfilled שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> till three שָׁבֻעִ֖ים <S%H7620><s%> weeks יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> whole פ

וּבְי֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> And in the four לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <S%H7223><s%> of the first וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I הָיִ֛יתִי <S%H1961><s%> become עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> was by יַ֧ד <S%H3027><s%> as I was by the side הַנָּהָ֛ר <S%H5104><s%> river הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> of the great ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> that חִדָּֽקֶל׃ <S%H2313><s%> which [is] Hiddekel

וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> Then I lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינַי֙ <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes וָאֵ֔רֶא <S%H7200><s%> and looked וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> and behold a certain לָב֣וּשׁ <S%H3847><s%> clothed בַּדִּ֑ים <S%H906><s%> in linen וּמָתְנָ֥יו <S%H4975><s%> whose loins חֲגֻרִ֖ים <S%H2296><s%> [were] girded בְּכֶ֥תֶם <S%H3800><s%> with fine gold אוּפָֽז׃ <S%H210><s%> of Uphaz

וּגְוִיָּת֣וֹ <S%H1472><s%> His body כְתַרְשִׁ֗ישׁ <S%H8658><s%> also [was] like the beryl וּפָנָ֞יו <S%H6440><s%> and his face כְּמַרְאֵ֤ה <S%H4758><s%> as the appearance בָרָק֙ <S%H1300><s%> of lightning וְעֵינָיו֙ <S%H5869><s%> and his eyes כְּלַפִּ֣ידֵי <S%H3940><s%> as lamps אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire וּזְרֹֽעֹתָיו֙ <S%H2220><s%> and his arms וּמַרְגְּלֹתָ֔יו <S%H4772><s%> and his feet כְּעֵ֖ין <S%H5869><s%> like in colour נְחֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> brass קָלָ֑ל <S%H7044><s%> to polished וְק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the voice דְּבָרָ֖יו <S%H1697><s%> of his words כְּק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> like the voice הָמֽוֹן׃ <S%H1995><s%> of a multitude

וְרָאִיתִי֩ <S%H7200><s%> alone saw אֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> I דָנִיֵּ֤אל <S%H1840><s%> And I Daniel לְבַדִּי֙ <S%H905><s%> alone אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּרְאָ֔ה <S%H4759><s%> the vision וְהָאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H582><s%> for the men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עִמִּ֔י <S%H5973><s%> with לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not רָא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> that were with me saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּרְאָ֑ה <S%H4759><s%> not the vision אֲבָ֗ל <S%H61><s%> but חֲרָדָ֤ה <S%H2731><s%> quaking גְדֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> a great נָפְלָ֣ה <S%H5307><s%> fell עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> on וַֽיִּבְרְח֖וּ <S%H1272><s%> upon them so that they fled בְּהֵחָבֵֽא׃ <S%H2244><s%> to hide

וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I נִשְׁאַ֣רְתִּי <S%H7604><s%> Therefore I was left alone לְבַדִּ֔י <S%H905><s%> alone וָֽאֶרְאֶ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> and saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּרְאָ֤ה <S%H4759><s%> vision הַגְּדֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> this great הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> yet וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no נִשְׁאַר־ <S%H7604><s%> and there remained בִּ֖י כֹּ֑ח <S%H3581><s%> no strength וְהוֹדִ֗י <S%H1935><s%> in me for my comeliness נֶהְפַּ֤ךְ <S%H2015><s%> was turned עָלַי֙ <S%H5921><s%> unto לְמַשְׁחִ֔ית <S%H4889><s%> in me into corruption וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no עָצַ֖רְתִּי <S%H6113><s%> and I retained כֹּֽחַ׃ <S%H3581><s%> no strength

וָאֶשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> Yet heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> I the voice דְּבָרָ֑יו <S%H1697><s%> of his words וּכְשָׁמְעִי֙ <S%H8085><s%> and when I heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice דְּבָרָ֔יו <S%H1697><s%> of his words וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I הָיִ֛יתִי <S%H1961><s%> become נִרְדָּ֥ם <S%H7290><s%> then was I in a deep sleep עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פָּנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> on my face וּפָנַ֥י <S%H6440><s%> and my face אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> toward the ground

וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold יָ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> And behold an hand נָ֣גְעָה <S%H5060><s%> touched בִּ֑י וַתְּנִיעֵ֥נִי <S%H5128><s%> me which set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בִּרְכַּ֖י <S%H1290><s%> me upon my knees וְכַפּ֥וֹת <S%H3709><s%> and [upon] the palms יָדָֽי׃ <S%H3027><s%> of my hands

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלַ֡י <S%H413><s%> to me דָּנִיֵּ֣אל <S%H1840><s%> unto me O Daniel אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> a man חֲ֠מֻדוֹת <S%H2530><s%> beauty הָבֵ֨ן <S%H995><s%> understand בַּדְּבָרִ֜ים <S%H1697><s%> the words אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> that אָנֹכִ֨י <S%H595><s%> I am דֹבֵ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> that I speak אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> about וַעֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> unto thee and stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto עָמְדֶ֔ךָ <S%H5975><s%> unto me I stood כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for עַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> have now שֻׁלַּ֣חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> for unto thee am I now sent אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you וּבְדַבְּר֥וֹ <S%H1696><s%> And when he had spoken עִמִּ֛י <S%H5973><s%> with אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> this word הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this עָמַ֥דְתִּי <S%H5975><s%> and stand מַרְעִֽיד׃ <S%H7460><s%> trembling

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֵלַי֮ <S%H413><s%> about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֣א <S%H3372><s%> he unto me Fear דָנִיֵּאל֒ <S%H1840><s%> not Daniel כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הָרִאשׁ֗וֹן <S%H7223><s%> for from the first אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> you נָתַ֧תָּ <S%H5414><s%> that thou didst set אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> לִבְּךָ֛ <S%H3820><s%> thine heart לְהָבִ֧ין <S%H995><s%> to understand וּלְהִתְעַנּ֛וֹת <S%H6031><s%> and to chasten לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> thyself before אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נִשְׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> were heard דְבָרֶ֑יךָ <S%H1697><s%> thy words וַאֲנִי־ <S%H589><s%> and I בָ֖אתִי <S%H935><s%> and I am come בִּדְבָרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1697><s%> for thy words

וְשַׂ֣ר ׀ <S%H8269><s%> But the prince מַלְכ֣וּת <S%H4438><s%> of the kingdom פָּרַ֗ס <S%H6539><s%> of Persia עֹמֵ֤ד <S%H5975><s%> withstood לְנֶגְדִּי֙ <S%H5048><s%> about עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וְאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> me one י֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> days וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold מִֽיכָאֵ֗ל <S%H4317><s%> but lo Michael אַחַ֛ד <S%H259><s%> one הַשָּׂרִ֥ים <S%H8269><s%> princes הָרִאשֹׁנִ֖ים <S%H7223><s%> of the chief בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> came לְעָזְרֵ֑נִי <S%H5826><s%> to help וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I נוֹתַ֣רְתִּי <S%H3498><s%> me and I remained שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֵ֖צֶל <S%H681><s%> there with מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> the kings פָרָֽס׃ <S%H6539><s%> of Persia

וּבָ֙אתִי֙ <S%H935><s%> Now I am come לַהֲבִ֣ינְךָ֔ <S%H995><s%> to make thee understand אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> of what יִקְרָ֥ה <S%H7136><s%> what shall befall לְעַמְּךָ֖ <S%H5971><s%> thy people בְּאַחֲרִ֣ית <S%H319><s%> in the latter הַיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> yet חָז֖וֹן <S%H2377><s%> for yet the vision לַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> [is] for [many] days

וּבְדַבְּר֣וֹ <S%H1696><s%> And when he had spoken עִמִּ֔י <S%H5973><s%> with כַּדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> such words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> to these נָתַ֧תִּי <S%H5414><s%> unto me I set פָנַ֛י <S%H6440><s%> my face אַ֖רְצָה <S%H776><s%> toward the ground וְנֶאֱלָֽמְתִּי׃ <S%H481><s%> and I became dumb

וְהִנֵּ֗ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold כִּדְמוּת֙ <S%H1823><s%> And behold [one] like the similitude בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of men נֹגֵ֖עַ <S%H5060><s%> touched עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שְׂפָתָ֑י <S%H8193><s%> my lips וָאֶפְתַּח־ <S%H6605><s%> then I opened פִּ֗י <S%H6310><s%> my mouth וָאֲדַבְּרָה֙ <S%H1696><s%> and spake וָאֹֽמְרָה֙ <S%H559><s%> and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to him הָעֹמֵ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> unto him that stood לְנֶגְדִּ֔י <S%H5048><s%> before אֲדֹנִ֗י <S%H113><s%> before me O my lord בַּמַּרְאָה֙ <S%H4759><s%> by the vision נֶהֶפְכ֤וּ <S%H2015><s%> are turned צִירַי֙ <S%H6735><s%> my sorrows עָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> and וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no עָצַ֖רְתִּי <S%H6113><s%> upon me and I have retained כֹּֽחַ׃ <S%H3581><s%> no strength

וְהֵ֣יךְ <S%H1963><s%> For how יוּכַ֗ל <S%H3201><s%> can עֶ֤בֶד <S%H5650><s%> the servant אֲדֹנִי֙ <S%H113><s%> of this my lord זֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> such לְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> talk עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲדֹ֣נִי <S%H113><s%> of my lord זֶ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> such וַאֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I מֵעַ֙תָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> now לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יַעֲמָד־ <S%H5975><s%> there remained בִּ֣י כֹ֔חַ <S%H3581><s%> no strength וּנְשָׁמָ֖ה <S%H5397><s%> in me neither is there breath לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor נִשְׁאֲרָה־ <S%H7604><s%> left בִֽי׃

וַיֹּ֧סֶף <S%H3254><s%> Then there came again וַיִּגַּע־ <S%H5060><s%> and touched בִּ֛י כְּמַרְאֵ֥ה <S%H4758><s%> me [one] like the appearance אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of a man וַֽיְחַזְּקֵֽנִי׃ <S%H2388><s%> and he strengthened

וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And said אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֧א <S%H3372><s%> fear אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> O man חֲמֻד֛וֹת <S%H2530><s%> beauty שָׁל֥וֹם <S%H7965><s%> not peace לָ֖ךְ חֲזַ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> [be] unto thee be strong וַחֲזָ֑ק <S%H2388><s%> yea be strong וּֽבְדַבְּר֤וֹ <S%H1696><s%> And when he had spoken עִמִּי֙ <S%H5973><s%> with הִתְחַזַּ֔קְתִּי <S%H2388><s%> unto me I was strengthened וָאֹ֥מְרָ֛ה <S%H559><s%> and said יְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> speak אֲדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> Let my lord כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for חִזַּקְתָּֽנִי׃ <S%H2388><s%> for thou hast strengthened

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said הֲיָדַ֙עְתָּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> he Knowest לָמָּה־ <S%H4100><s%> why בָּ֣אתִי <S%H935><s%> thou wherefore I come אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> shall now אָשׁ֔וּב <S%H7725><s%> unto thee? and now will I return לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> to fight עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against שַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> with the prince פָּרָ֑ס <S%H6539><s%> of Persia וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I יוֹצֵ֔א <S%H3318><s%> and when I am gone forth וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> lo the prince יָוָ֖ן <S%H3120><s%> of Grecia בָּֽא׃ <S%H935><s%> shall come

אֲבָל֙ <S%H61><s%> But אַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> I will shew לְךָ֔ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָשׁ֥וּם <S%H7559><s%> thee that which is noted בִּכְתָ֖ב <S%H3791><s%> in the scripture אֱמֶ֑ת <S%H571><s%> of truth וְאֵ֨ין <S%H369><s%> there אֶחָ֜ד <S%H259><s%> and [there is] none מִתְחַזֵּ֤ק <S%H2388><s%> that holdeth עִמִּי֙ <S%H5973><s%> with עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against אֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo מִיכָאֵ֖ל <S%H4317><s%> with me in these things but Michael שַׂרְכֶֽם׃ <S%H8269><s%> your prince פ
